duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively identify and recommend financial products and services to help members reach their financial goals.
Service members on the teller line with monetary transactions, account maintenance, ownership changes, wire requests, IRA transactions, automatic transfers, disputes, and serve as notary public.
Maintain and deepen member relationships through consultative analysis and recommendation of Desert Financial products.
Strategically build and optimize referral network and pipeline to meet or exceed monthly performance metrics through outbound calls, community outreach, and networking.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Diploma or GED (Nationwide Mortgage Lending System (NMLS) and Notary Public Certifications or must be obtained through training)
